General.Name: FP Newspapers Inc
General.Description: FP Newspapers Inc. publishes, prints, and distributes daily and weekly newspapers, and specialty publications in Manitoba. It owns and publishes the Winnipeg Free Press and Brandon Sun. The company also delivers advertising materials and provides commercial printing services. FP Newspapers Inc. was founded in 1999 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 650 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 4N8
